'''v0.13.1 alpha''' is a minor update to [[Pocket Edition]] and the [[Windows 10 Edition]] Beta released on December 14, 2015 that fixes bugs present in [[Pocket Edition v0.13.0 alpha|v0.13.0]] and added a new skin pack. While it isn't the last update to v0.13.0 alpha, it is the last one before the builds of v0.14.0 alpha started. This is the final version released in 2015.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Skin/Skin pack|Skin packs]]'''
* {{Version exclusive}}: [[Holiday Skin Pack 2015]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Title Screen]]'''
* Moved the "Skins" button to the Title Screen
* Options is no longer a wrench icon
** Increased the button size of both
** Options menu now has three left panels, instead of four
* PE title screen now looks more like Windows 10 Edition title screen
